arts.ttl: St. Pauli secure vital win in relegation battle against Heidenheim
arts.sum: St. Pauli clinched an important 2-0 victory away to Heidenheim, with Johannes Eggestein and Morgan Guilavogui providing the goals in what was a crucial match in the relegation battle. A big away win: A strong team performance from St. Pauli sealed an important victory - IMAGO/Eibner-Pressefoto/Florian Wolf

arts.ttl: Official | Heidenheim confirm departures of Mikkel Kaufmann and Denis Thomalla
arts.sum: FC Heidenheim CEO Holger Sanwald continues to actively work his January transfer window docket. The Bundesliga boss shed two pieces of dead-weight off his roster in the last 24 hours,…

arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. St. Pauli preview: Two relegation rivals face off
arts.sum: St. Pauli will travel to the Voith-Arena for Saturday’s Bundesliga meeting with relegation rivals Heidenheim.

arts.ttl: Preview: Heidenheim vs. St Pauli - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Heidenheim and St Pauli, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen and the potential curse of Heidenheim
arts.sum: There was a day when Werder Bremen were celebrating FC Heidenheim's promotion to the Bundesliga. Now they're being haunted by them.
